code_value:
Questions 1~2 You and your classmates are talking about a robbery which happened in a bank last night. Ask your classmates two questions about it.
Questions 3~4 Your English teacher is introducing a very good English programme, Studio Classroom, to you. Ask your teacher two questions about it.
